'Aia' (; ) is a small village situated on the slopes of Mount Pagoeta in the
Basque province of Gipuzkoa, Spain. It is located 30 km to the west of Donostia-
San Sebastián and about 10 km inland from the coastal town of Zarautz. Aia
is set amongst hills and forests, and surrounded by mountains. The town still
retains its ancient character, with the large Church of San Esteban building as
an impressive centrepiece. The population of Aia has gradually declined since
the 1950s, to a population of 1,750 in 2005.
